00029 namespace Crossfade
00030 {
00031         enum RState
00032         {
00033                 METHOD, URL, URLPARM, URLVALUE, VERSION,
00034                 HEADERKEY, HEADERVALUE, BODY, OK
00035         };
00036 
00037         enum RespState
00038         {
00039                 OK = 200,
00040                 BAD_REQUEST = 400,
00041                 NOT_FOUND = 404
00042         }
00043 
00044         public struct HTTPRequestStruct
00045         {
00046                 public string Method;
00047                 public Uri URL;
00048                 public string Version;
00049                 public Hashtable Args;
00050                 public bool Execute;
00051                 public Hashtable Headers;
00052                 public int BodySize;
00053                 public byte[] BodyData;
00054         }
00055 
00056         public struct HTTPResponseStruct
00057         {
00058                 public int status;
00059                 public string version;
00060                 public Hashtable Headers;
00061                 public int BodySize;
00062                 public byte[] BodyData;
00063                 public System.IO.Stream fs;
00064         }
00065 
00069         public class CsHTTPRequest
00070         {
00071                 private TcpClient client;
00072 
00073                 private RState ParserState;
00074 
00075                 private HTTPRequestStruct HTTPRequest;
00076 
00077                 private HTTPResponseStruct HTTPResponse;
00078 
00079                 byte[] myReadBuffer;
00080 
00081                 CsHTTPServer Parent;
00082 
00083                 public CsHTTPRequest(TcpClient client, CsHTTPServer Parent)
00084                 {
00085                         this.client = client;
00086                         this.Parent = Parent;
00087 
00088                         this.HTTPResponse.BodySize = 0;
00089                 }
00090 
00091                 public void Process()
00092                 {
00093                         myReadBuffer = new byte[client.ReceiveBufferSize];
00094                         String myCompleteMessage = "";
00095                         int numberOfBytesRead = 0;
00096 
00097                         Parent.WriteLog("Connection accepted. Buffer: " + client.ReceiveBufferSize.ToString());
00098                         NetworkStream ns = client.GetStream();
00099 
00100                         string hValue = "";
00101                         string hKey = "";
00102 
00103                         try
00104                         {
00105                                 // binary data buffer index
00106                                 int bfndx = 0;
00107                                 string pathTmp = "";
00108 
00109                                 // Incoming message may be larger than the buffer size.
00110                                 do
00111                                 {
00112                                         numberOfBytesRead = ns.Read(myReadBuffer, 0, myReadBuffer.Length);
00113                                         myCompleteMessage =
00114                                                 String.Concat(myCompleteMessage, Encoding.ASCII.GetString(myReadBuffer, 0, numberOfBytesRead));
00115 
00116                                         // read buffer index
00117                                         int ndx = 0;
00118                                         do
00119                                         {
00120                                                 switch (ParserState)
00121                                                 {
00122                                                         case RState.METHOD:
00123                                                                 if (myReadBuffer[ndx] != ' ')
00124                                                                         HTTPRequest.Method += (char)myReadBuffer[ndx++];
00125                                                                 else
00126                                                                 {
00127                                                                         ndx++;
00128                                                                         ParserState = RState.URL;
00129                                                                 }
00130                                                                 break;
00131                                                         case RState.URL:
00132                                                                 if (myReadBuffer[ndx] == '?')
00133                                                                 {
00134                                                                         ndx++;
00135                                                                         hKey = "";
00136                                                                         HTTPRequest.Execute = true;
00137                                                                         HTTPRequest.Args = new Hashtable();
00138                                                                         ParserState = RState.URLPARM;
00139                                                                 }
00140                                                                 else if (myReadBuffer[ndx] != ' ')
00141                                                                         pathTmp += (char)myReadBuffer[ndx++];
00142                                                                 else
00143                                                                 {
00144                                                                         ndx++;
00145                                                                         ParserState = RState.VERSION;
00146                                                                 }
00147                                                                 break;
00148                                                         case RState.URLPARM:
00149                                                                 if (myReadBuffer[ndx] == '=')
00150                                                                 {
00151                                                                         ndx++;
00152                                                                         hValue = "";
00153                                                                         ParserState = RState.URLVALUE;
00154                                                                 }
00155                                                                 else if (myReadBuffer[ndx] == ' ')
00156                                                                 {
00157                                                                         ndx++;
00158                                                                         ParserState = RState.VERSION;
00159                                                                 }
00160                                                                 else
00161                                                                 {
00162                                                                         hKey += (char)myReadBuffer[ndx++];
00163                                                                 }
00164                                                                 break;
00165                                                         case RState.URLVALUE:
00166                                                                 if (myReadBuffer[ndx] == '&')
00167                                                                 {
00168                                                                         ndx++;
00169                                                                         hKey = HttpUtility.UrlDecode(hKey);
00170                                                                         hValue = HttpUtility.UrlDecode(hValue);
00171                                                                         HTTPRequest.Args[hKey] = HTTPRequest.Args[hKey] != null ? HTTPRequest.Args[hKey] + ", " + hValue : hValue;
00172                                                                         hKey = "";
00173                                                                         ParserState = RState.URLPARM;
00174                                                                 }
00175                                                                 else if (myReadBuffer[ndx] == ' ')
00176                                                                 {
00177                                                                         ndx++;
00178                                                                         hKey = HttpUtility.UrlDecode(hKey);
00179                                                                         hValue = HttpUtility.UrlDecode(hValue);
00180                                                                         HTTPRequest.Args[hKey] = HTTPRequest.Args[hKey] != null ? HTTPRequest.Args[hKey] + ", " + hValue : hValue;
00181                                                                         ParserState = RState.VERSION;
00182                                                                 }
00183                                                                 else
00184                                                                 {
00185                                                                         hValue += (char)myReadBuffer[ndx++];
00186                                                                 }
00187                                                                 break;
00188                                                         case RState.VERSION:
00189                                                                 if (myReadBuffer[ndx] == '\r')
00190                                                                         ndx++;
00191                                                                 else if (myReadBuffer[ndx] != '\n')
00192                                                                         HTTPRequest.Version += (char)myReadBuffer[ndx++];
00193                                                                 else
00194                                                                 {
00195                                                                         ndx++;
00196                                                                         hKey = "";
00197                                                                         HTTPRequest.Headers = new Hashtable();
00198                                                                         ParserState = RState.HEADERKEY;
00199                                                                 }
00200                                                                 break;
00201                                                         case RState.HEADERKEY:
00202                                                                 if (myReadBuffer[ndx] == '\r')
00203                                                                         ndx++;
00204                                                                 else if (myReadBuffer[ndx] == '\n')
00205                                                                 {
00206                                                                         ndx++;
00207                                                                         if (HTTPRequest.Headers["Content-Length"] != null)
00208                                                                         {
00209                                                                                 HTTPRequest.BodySize = Convert.ToInt32(HTTPRequest.Headers["Content-Length"]);
00210                                                                                 this.HTTPRequest.BodyData = new byte[this.HTTPRequest.BodySize];
00211                                                                                 ParserState = RState.BODY;
00212                                                                         }
00213                                                                         else
00214                                                                                 ParserState = RState.OK;
00215 
00216                                                                 }
00217                                                                 else if (myReadBuffer[ndx] == ':')
00218                                                                         ndx++;
00219                                                                 else if (myReadBuffer[ndx] != ' ')
00220                                                                         hKey += (char)myReadBuffer[ndx++];
00221                                                                 else
00222                                                                 {
00223                                                                         ndx++;
00224                                                                         hValue = "";
00225                                                                         ParserState = RState.HEADERVALUE;
00226                                                                 }
00227                                                                 break;
00228                                                         case RState.HEADERVALUE:
00229                                                                 if (myReadBuffer[ndx] == '\r')
00230                                                                         ndx++;
00231                                                                 else if (myReadBuffer[ndx] != '\n')
00232                                                                         hValue += (char)myReadBuffer[ndx++];
00233                                                                 else
00234                                                                 {
00235                                                                         ndx++;
00236                                                                         HTTPRequest.Headers.Add(hKey, hValue);
00237                                                                         hKey = "";
00238                                                                         ParserState = RState.HEADERKEY;
00239                                                                 }
00240                                                                 break;
00241                                                         case RState.BODY:
00242                                                                 // Append to request BodyData
00243                                                                 Array.Copy(myReadBuffer, ndx, this.HTTPRequest.BodyData, bfndx, numberOfBytesRead - ndx);
00244                                                                 bfndx += numberOfBytesRead - ndx;
00245                                                                 ndx = numberOfBytesRead;
00246                                                                 if (this.HTTPRequest.BodySize <= bfndx)
00247                                                                 {
00248                                                                         ParserState = RState.OK;
00249                                                                 }
00250                                                                 break;
00251                                                         default:
00252                                                                 ndx++;
00253                                                                 break;
00254 
00255                                                 }
00256                                         }
00257                                         while (ndx < numberOfBytesRead);
00258 
00259                                 }
00260                                 while (ns.DataAvailable);
00261 
00262                                 HTTPRequest.URL = new Uri("http://localhost" + pathTmp);
00263 
00264                                 // Print out the received message to the console.
00265                                 Parent.WriteLog("You received the following message : \n" + myCompleteMessage);
00266 
00267                                 HTTPResponse.version = "HTTP/1.1";
00268 
00269                                 if (ParserState != RState.OK)
00270                                         HTTPResponse.status = (int)RespState.BAD_REQUEST;
00271                                 else
00272                                         HTTPResponse.status = (int)RespState.OK;
00273 
00274                                 this.HTTPResponse.Headers = new Hashtable();
00275                                 this.HTTPResponse.Headers.Add("Server", Parent.Name);
00276                                 this.HTTPResponse.Headers.Add("Date", DateTime.Now.ToString("r"));
00277 
00278                                 // if (HTTPResponse.status == (int)RespState.OK)
00279                                 this.Parent.OnResponse(ref this.HTTPRequest, ref this.HTTPResponse);
00280 
00281                                 string HeadersString = this.HTTPResponse.version + " " + this.Parent.respStatus[this.HTTPResponse.status] + "\r\n";
00282 
00283                                 foreach (DictionaryEntry Header in this.HTTPResponse.Headers)
00284                                 {
00285                                         HeadersString += Header.Key + ": " + Header.Value + "\r\n";
00286                                 }
00287 
00288                                 HeadersString += "\r\n";
00289                                 byte[] bHeadersString = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(HeadersString);
00290 
00291                                 // Send headers 
00292                                 ns.Write(bHeadersString, 0, bHeadersString.Length);
00293 
00294                                 // Send body
00295                                 if (this.HTTPResponse.BodyData != null)
00296                                         ns.Write(this.HTTPResponse.BodyData, 0, this.HTTPResponse.BodyData.Length);
00297 
00298                                 if (this.HTTPResponse.fs != null)
00299                                         using (this.HTTPResponse.fs)
00300                                         {
00301                                                 byte[] b = new byte[client.SendBufferSize];
00302                                                 int bytesRead;
00303                                                 while ((bytesRead = this.HTTPResponse.fs.Read(b, 0, b.Length)) > 0)
00304                                                 {
00305                                                         ns.Write(b, 0, bytesRead);
00306                                                 }
00307 
00308                                                 this.HTTPResponse.fs.Close();
00309                                         }
00310 
00311                         }
00312                         catch (Exception e)
00313                         {
00314                                 Parent.WriteLog(e.ToString());
00315                         }
00316                         finally
00317                         {
00318                                 ns.Close();
00319                                 client.Close();
00320                                 if (this.HTTPResponse.fs != null)
00321                                         this.HTTPResponse.fs.Close();
00322                                 Thread.CurrentThread.Abort();
00323                         }
00324                 }
00325 
00326         }
00327 }
